channel.title: Quran Podcast
channel.description: A podcast that recites the Quran with beautiful recitations by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy.

item.title: Surah Al-Fatiha (The Opening) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha (The Opening) with 7 verses. This Surah is often recited in daily prayers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Fatiha - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Listen to the beautiful recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy, consisting of 7 verses.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow) with 286 verses. The longest Surah in the Quran.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Baqarah - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow), the longest Surah of the Quran, containing 286 verses. This Surah provides guidance and wisdom for all aspects of life.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity) with 4 verses. A declaration of God's oneness.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Ikhlas - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Listen to the recitation of Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity) by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy. This Surah emphasizes the oneness of Allah.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak) with 5 verses. A Surah that seeks protection from evil.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Falaq - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak), seeking protection from the evil of creation.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah An-Nas (The Mankind) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah An-Nas (The Mankind) with 6 verses. A Surah for seeking protection from evil whispers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah An-Nas - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah An-Nas (The Mankind), a supplication for protection from evil whispers and harm.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Ahzab (The Confederates) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Ahzab (The Confederates) with 73 verses. It discusses the Battle of the Confederates and various laws.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Ahzab - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Ahzab (The Confederates), which discusses the Battle of the Confederates and various laws.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Ya-Sin (The Heart of the Quran) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Ya-Sin (The Heart of the Quran) with 83 verses. A Surah that provides comfort and solace for the believers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Ya-Sin - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Ya-Sin (The Heart of the Quran), known for its great significance in providing comfort and blessings.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Mulk (The Sovereignty) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Mulk (The Sovereignty) with 30 verses. A Surah that emphasizes Allah's control over everything in the universe.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Mulk - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Mulk (The Sovereignty), a Surah that underscores Allah's control over everything in the universe.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Kahf (The Cave) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Kahf (The Cave) with 110 verses. It includes stories of the people of the cave and other lessons for believers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Kahf - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Kahf (The Cave), which narrates stories of the people of the cave and offers guidance to believers.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Mu’minun (The Believers) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Mu’minun (The Believers) with 118 verses. A Surah that outlines the qualities of the true believers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Mu’minun - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Mu’minun (The Believers), which describes the attributes of the true believers.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Hud (Prophet Hud) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Hud with 123 verses. A Surah that contains stories of past prophets and the lessons derived from them.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Hud - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Hud, which offers the stories of past prophets and the valuable lessons they teach.

item.title: Surah Yusuf (Joseph) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Yusuf with 111 verses. A Surah telling the story of Prophet Joseph, filled with lessons of patience and perseverance.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Yusuf - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Yusuf, which narrates the story of Prophet Joseph, filled with lessons of patience and forgiveness.

item.title: Surah Ibrahim (Abraham) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Ibrahim with 52 verses. A Surah that discusses the story of Prophet Ibrahim and his supplications to Allah.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Ibrahim - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Ibrahim, which discusses the story of Prophet Ibrahim and his supplications to Allah.

item.title: Surah Al-Hijr (The Rocky Tract) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Hijr with 99 verses. A Surah that highlights the consequences faced by the disbelievers and the power of Allah.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Hijr - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Hijr, which discusses the destruction of previous nations and the greatness of Allah's creation.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah An-Nahl (The Bee) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah An-Nahl with 128 verses. A Surah that speaks about the signs of Allah in creation and the benefits provided to mankind.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah An-Nahl - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah An-Nahl, which mentions the benefits of Allah's creation, such as honeybees and the guidance for mankind.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Isra (The Night Journey) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Isra with 111 verses. A Surah that highlights the Night Journey of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and mentions several aspects of faith.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Isra - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Isra, which speaks about the miraculous Night Journey and several aspects of faith.

item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Kahf with 110 verses. A Surah that discusses the story of the people of the cave, and other parables and wisdom.

item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Kahf - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Kahf, which includes the parables of the people of the cave and lessons from past generations.

item.title: Surah Maryam (Mary) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Maryam with 98 verses. A Surah that tells the story of Maryam (Mary) and the miraculous birth of Prophet Isa (Jesus).
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Maryam - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Maryam, which tells the story of Maryam (Mary) and the miraculous birth of Prophet Isa (Jesus).

item.title: Surah Ta-Ha (Ta-Ha) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Ta-Ha with 135 verses. A Surah that recounts the story of Prophet Musa (Moses) and his mission to free the Israelites.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Ta-Ha - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Ta-Ha, which recounts the story of Prophet Musa (Moses) and his efforts to free the Israelites.

item.title: Surah Al-Anbiya (The Prophets) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Anbiya with 112 verses. A Surah that mentions the stories of several prophets and their communities.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Anbiya - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Anbiya, which contains the stories of the prophets sent to guide humanity.
